SALTelemetry.Description: Air turbulence measured by a 3-dimensional anemometer. The reported values are computed from data that is accumulated over a configurable period that is typically on the order of a minute.

item.Description: Time at which the most recent data was read (TAI unix seconds).
Standard deviation of wind speed (x, y, z) estimated from quartiles.
Median sonic temperature (air temperature measured sonically). Sonic temperature has poor absolute accuracy (it can be off by several degrees) but good time resolution.
Standard devation of sonic temperature (air temperature measured sonically) estimated from quartiles.

SALTelemetry.Description: Wind speed and direction. The reported values are computed from data that is accumulated over a configurable period that is typically on the order of a minute.

item.Description: Time at which the most recent data was read (TAI unix seconds).
Circular mean wind direction: 0 = north, 90 = east.
Circular standard deviation of wind direction. Not available for all sensor types.
Median (mean for some sensors) wind speed.
Standard deviation of wind speed estimated from quartiles. Not available for all sensor types.

SALTelemetry.Description: Dew point.

item.Description: Time at which the data was read (TAI unix seconds).

SALTelemetry.Description: Pressure sensors with up to 8 channels.

item.Description: Time at which the data was read (TAI unix seconds).
The number of channels (minimum 1 and maximum 8).
Comma-separated string with the locations of the sensors for each channel.

SALTelemetry.Description: Rate of rainfall.

item.Description: Time at which the data was read (TAI unix seconds).

SALTelemetry.Description: Relative humidity.

item.Description: Time at which the data was read (TAI unix seconds).

SALTelemetry.Description: Rate of snowfall.

item.Description: Time at which the data was read (TAI unix seconds).
Snowfall rate measured over a configurable period on the order of a minute.

SALTelemetry.Description: Solar radiation.

item.Description: Time at which the data was read (TAI unix seconds).
Median (mean for some sensors) solar radiation measured over a configurable period on the order of a minute.

SALTelemetry.Description: Temperature Sensors with up to 16 channels.

item.Description: Time at which the data was read (TAI unix seconds).
The number of channels (minimum 1 and maximum 16).
Comma-separated string with the locations of the sensors for each channel.

SALTelemetry.Description: Raw data from a 3-axis accelerometer.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the accelerometer (e.g. AuxTel_accel1).
Starting time of data acquisition (TAI unix seconds).
Data collection time interval. N-th (starting from 0) sample is assumed to be taken at "timestamp" + "interval" * N.
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Acceleration PSD computed from a 3-axis accelerometer.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the accelerometer (e.g. AuxTel_accel1).
Starting time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds) used to compute PSDs.
PSD maximum frequency. Note that the minimum frequency is always 0 Hz.
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Electric field strength. The reported values are computed from data that is accumulated over a configurable period that is typically on the order of a second.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel EFM-100C).
Time at which the most recent data was read (TAI unix seconds).
Standard deviation of electric field strength (range -20.00 to 20.00) estimated from quartiles.
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Lightning strike status (once per second). This is a summary of the lightning strikes detected.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel LD-250).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Rate of close strikes (0 - 999 strikes/minute). The range, for which a strike is considered close, can be configured in ts_config_ocs.
Status of the close alarm (false: not active, true: active). The range, for which a close alarm is emitted, can be configured in the hardware sensor itself.
Status of the close alarm (false: not active, true: active). The range, for which a severa alarm is emitted, can be configured in the hardware sensor itself.
Current heading from GPS or compass. The sensor is at a fixed place so this is not likely to change.
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Spectrum analyzer trace (once per second).

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel SSA3000X).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
The start frequency of the spectrum trace.
The stop frequency of the spectrum trace.
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Earthquake broad band, high gain data.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. QT-6317).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Earthquake broad band, low gain data.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. QT-6317).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Earthquake high broad band, high gain data.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. QT-6317).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Earthquake high broad band, low gain data.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. QT-6317).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Earthquake long period, high gain data.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. QT-6317).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Earthquake long period, low gain data.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. QT-6317).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Earthquake ultra long period, high gain data.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. QT-6317).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Earthquake very long period, high gain data.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor (e.g. QT-6317).
Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Physical location of the sensor (e.g. AuxTel Truss).

SALTelemetry.Description: Telemetry for Netbooter PDU devices.

item.Description: The value of the SNMP System Description field.
The name of the device (usually the hostname).

SALTelemetry.Description: Telemetry for Raritan devices.

item.Description: The value of the SNMP System Description field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet rmsCurrent field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet unbalancedCurrent field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet rmsVoltage field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet activePower field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet apparentPower field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet powerFactor field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet activeEnergy field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet frequency field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet unbalancedVoltage field.
The value of the SNMP Inlet unbalancedLineLineVoltage field.
The value of the SNMP Outlet rmsCurrent field.
The value of the SNMP Outlet rmsVoltage field.
The value of the SNMP Outlet activePower field.
The value of the SNMP Outlet apparentPower field.
The value of the SNMP Outlet powerFactor field.
The value of the SNMP Outlet activeEnergy field.
The value of the SNMP Outlet onOff field.
The value of the SNMP Outlet frequency field.
The name of the device (usually the hostname).

SALTelemetry.Description: Telemetry for Schneider PM5XXX devices.

item.Description: The value of the SNMP System Description field.
Total Power Factor - Phase (A, B, C)
Total Displacement Power Factor - Phase (A, B, C)
Accumulated Energy - Date /Time of Last Reset
The name of the device (usually the hostname).

SALTelemetry.Description: Telemetry for XUPS devices.

item.Description: The value of the SNMP System Description field.
Battery run time in seconds before UPS turns off due to low battery.
Battery voltage as reported by the UPS meters.
The reading of the ambient temperature in the vicinity of the UPS or SNMP agent.
Battery Current as reported by the UPS metering. Current is positive when discharging, negative when recharging the battery.
The measured input current from the UPS meters in amps.
The measured input real power in watts.
The measured input voltage from the UPS meters in volts.
The utility line frequency in tenths of Hz.
The measured UPS output current in amps.
The measured real output power in watts.
The measured output voltage from the UPS metering in volts.
The measured UPS output frequency in tenths of Hz.
The UPS output load in percent of rated capacity.
The measured UPS bypass voltage in volts.
The bypass frequency in tenths of Hz.

Gives the status of the Advanced Battery Management; batteryFloating(3) status means that the charger is temporarily charging the battery to its float voltage; batteryResting(4) is the state when the battery is fully charged and none of the other actions (charging/discharging/floating) is being done.
The name of the device (usually the hostname).

SALTelemetry.Description: Aircraft track read from DGAC radars.

item.Description: Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
The id of the radar and aircraft.
The id of the aircraft assigned by the secondary surveillance radar (SSR).
The latitude position of the aircraft.
The longitude position of the aircraft.
The velocity of the aircraft in the x axis.
The velocity of the aircraft in the Y axis.

SALTelemetry.Description: Telemetry for generator set devices using Advanced Genset Controller (AGC) 150.

item.Description: Time of data acqusition (TAI Unix seconds).
Any alarm on PMS from ID1 to ID8?
Any alarm on mains (Mains Command Unit)?
Ready auto-start from DG1 to DG8.
Generator Export, reactive energy counter, total (kVArh).
Generator Export, active energy counter, day (kWh).
Generator Export, active energy counter, week (kWh).
Generator Export, active energy counter, month (kWh).
Generator Export, active energy counter, total (kWh).
Bus B voltage phase angle L1-L2.
Bus B voltage phase angle L2-L3.
Bus B voltage phase angle L3-L1.
U BB L1 - U GEN L1 phase angle.
U BB L2 - U GEN L2 phase angle.
U BB L3 - U GEN L3 phase angle.
Mains power: Multi-input 20 or 4th CT input.

SALTelemetry.Description: Particle measurements from the SPS30 Sensirion particle sensor.

item.Description: The user-defined name of the sensor.
Time at which the data was read (TAI unix seconds).
The particle sizes corresponding to the concentration data.
Particulate matter concentrations for sizes specified in particleSizes.
Number concentrations of particles for sizes specified in particleSizes.
Indicator of weighted average particle size detected by the sensor.
